snippet: Manchester City avoided what would have been another slip-up against a Premier League newcomer by beating Hull City a week after a loss at Cardiff.
abstract: Manchester City beats Hull City, 2-0, in English Premier League soccer.
lead_paragraph: Manchester City avoided what would have been another slip-up against a Premier League newcomer by beating Hull City a week after a loss at Cardiff.

headline.main: City Defeats Hull, but It’s a Challenge
